message.body: hopefully our score will be better than that... we're playing trivia.
Excellent! I think we probably are too. The free answer is 1986, I wonder what the question will be.
that was my thought! that was a big year politically, right? but it could easily be pop culture too.
Damfino. We will see! Good luck!
advance ticket sales for ben at family circle opened today! the pw is ###
Yesterday for fan club members was what i read, and the 22nd for mortals like me. I tried. Do you know something i dont?
you just use the password on ticketmaster.
What password? I thought only the elite BNL fan club folks got that.
the pw is ###
Am i supposed to have known that? Also, do you think Mom wants to go? I thought she would mention it last night he she did, but no word.
no, i saw it on ben's twitter like 5 minutes ago (though it was in the first text i sent). idk, i would just ask her directly again, maybe.
K. Tnx. Do you want to go with me or should i get seats for more? Or less? Its early and i an easily confused.
definitely go with you (and mom, if she wants to go)!
did you end up purchasing anything?
Not yet. I just got back from riding. I will get to that directly as they say.
Does row 17 on the floor sound okay?
heck yes! is that not crazy expensive?!
About a hundred less than row 15. For all three that is.
weird! the aisle must stop at 15
It does. So we will be in the second row behind the aisle. Seats 43 44 45
so cooool!
Only four more months to go!
